gobblin.compliance.purger

Class HivePurgerQueryTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compliance.purger.HivePurgerQueryTemplate

  • public class HivePurgerQueryTemplate
extends Object
    This class creates all queries required by HivePurgerConverter

    • Method Detail

      • getUseDbQuery

        public static String getUseDbQuery(String dbName)
        Use the staging db for creating staging tables. Alter query doesn't work with dbName.tableName.

      • getAutoConvertJoinProperty

        public static String getAutoConvertJoinProperty()

      • getDynamicPartitionNonStrictModeProperty

        public static String getDynamicPartitionNonStrictModeProperty()
        Will allow insert query to specify only partition coloumn names instead of partition spec.

      • getOptimizeSortDynamicPartition

        public static String getOptimizeSortDynamicPartition()
        To get around the OOM, we need to set hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition to true so that the data is sorted by partition key and at one time only one partition needs to be accessed.

      • getCreateTableQuery

        public static String getCreateTableQuery(String completeNewTableName,
                                         String likeTableDbName,
                                         String likeTableName,
                                         String location)
        If staging table doesn't exist, it will create a staging table.

                                         String likeTableDbName,
                                         String likeTableName)

      • getInsertQuery

        public static String getInsertQuery(PurgeableHivePartitionDataset dataset)
        This query will create a partition in staging table and insert the datasets whose compliance id is not contained in the compliance id table.

      • getPurgeQueries

        public static List<String> getPurgeQueries(PurgeableHivePartitionDataset dataset)
        Will return all the queries needed to populate the staging table partition. This won't include alter table partition location query.

      • getCreateStagingTableQuery

        public static List<String> getCreateStagingTableQuery(PurgeableHivePartitionDataset dataset)

        public static List<String> getBackupQueries(PurgeableHivePartitionDataset dataset)
        Will return all the queries needed to have a backup table partition pointing to the original partition data location

      • getAlterOriginalPartitionLocationQueries

        public static List<String> getAlterOriginalPartitionLocationQueries(PurgeableHivePartitionDataset dataset)
        Will return all the queries needed to alter the location of the table partition. Alter table partition query doesn't work with syntax dbName.tableName

      • getDropStagingTableQuery

        public static List<String> getDropStagingTableQuery(PurgeableHivePartitionDataset dataset)

      • getWhereClauseForPartition

        public static String getWhereClauseForPartition(Map<String,String> spec,
                                                String prefix)
        This method builds the where clause for the insertion query. If prefix is a, then it builds a.datepartition='2016-01-01-00' AND a.size='12345' from [datepartition : '2016-01-01-00', size : '12345']

      • getCommaSeparatedColumnNames

        public static String getCommaSeparatedColumnNames(List<FieldSchema> cols,
